justification: Recognizes B values workhorse RBs, but ignores B’s conservative, consensus-driven mindset and existing RB depth. Offers a Tier 5 RB from a low-volume offense (which B likely fades) for B’s Tier 1 and Tier 2 WRs—an extreme value gap and a 2-for-1 depth hit B won’t accept while needing wins. Mislabels the asked WRs as “stable” despite mid variance and one declining role. Rationale is too shallow and overlooks roster context and market value; acceptance probability is overstated.
